definition: a substance used as a coating to protect or decorate a surface (especially a mixture of pigment suspended in a liquid), apply paint to
details:
noun
- a substance used as a coating to protect or decorate a surface (especially a mixture of pigment suspended in a liquid)
= synonyms: pigment
- makeup consisting of a pink or red powder applied to the cheeks
= synonyms: rouge, blusher
- in basketball, a space including the foul line in front of the basket at each end of a basketball court, usually painted a different color from the rest of the court
= example: in basketball, a space including the foul line in front of the basket at each end of a basketball court, usually painted a different color from the rest of the court
= synonyms: key
verb
- apply paint to
= example: apply paint to
- apply a liquid to
= example: apply a liquid to
- make a painting of
= example: make a painting of
- make a painting
= example: make a painting
